artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, on image, lettered: Claudio Gilee | LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude Lorraine delt. / No. 87. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: London. Pub. May 2. 1817 by Boydell &. title: Landscape with the Angel and Hagar
